title: Strings & Pricing
text:
Note: All prices listed below are for the string only. A flat $20 labor fee will be added to each racket for the stringing service.


Top-tier performance for competitive play, featuring maximum spin, tension maintenance, and control.

RPM Blast (16 Gauge)
Solinco Hyper G (16 Gauge)
Head Hawk Rough (17 Gauge)





High-performance co-polyesters that offer a perfect balance of durability and “bite” at a mid-range price.

Volkl Cyclone (17 Gauge)
Big Hitter Black 7 (16 Gauge)
Oehms Black Pearl Rough (1.21mm)





Softer materials designed for arm-friendliness, feel, and improved ball pocketing.

Prince Tour Xtra Power (17 Gauge)
Oehms Matador (1.19mm)





Reliable, high-quality strings at our most affordable price point.

Kirschbaum Orange (1.28mm)
Decathlon Artengo TA990 (16 Gauge)
Eagnas Nano (17 Gauge)




Already have your favorite set? We are happy to install it for you.

Labor Fee: $20 per racket

title: Chris Tennis Stringing
text:
Chris Tennis Stringing provides quality tennis stringing services at an affordable price. With a quick turnaround, you can expect your racket returned within a few days.
See the About Section for more details relating to cost and location. See the Strings Section for a list of strings we currently have in stock.

title: Chris Tennis Stringing
text:
Chris Tennis Stringing provides quality tennis stringing services at an affordable price. With a quick turnaround, you can expect your racket returned within a few days.



$20 labor per racket + cost of string
Deal: String 4 rackets, get the 5th labor-free!



Located near Macey’s on 800N in Orem, Utah. Contact for the exact address.

title: Extra Products
text:
Below are extra products available for purchase. Some items are free with a racquet stringing.




Basic Overgrip — $2 (*FREE)
Soft, padded cloth tape. Three types: Padded, Padded with Holes, Basic.
Wilson Overgrip — $3
Higher-quality soft, padded cloth tape.






Shock Absorber — $3 (*FREE)
Reduces vibration when the ball hits the strings.






Tourna Racquet Guard Tape — $3 (*FREE)
Protects racquets from nicks and scrapes.






Tourna Replacement Grip — $10
The base grip on the racquet handle. Slightly thicker for cushioning.






Replacement Grommets & Head Guard — ~$30
Plastic grommets prevent string/frame wear. Bumper guard protects the frame.
Requires restringing. Replacement sets may take a few weeks.
